ARABIC: قَالَ إِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ رَسُولُ رَبِّكِ لِأَهَبَ لَكِ غُلَٰمًا زَكِيًّا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He said, 'I am only your Lord's messenger so that He can give you a pure boy.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: He replied: "I am only a messenger from your Lord (sent) to bestow a good son on you."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: He said: "I am just a message-bearer of your Lord, I have come to grant you a most pure boy."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He said, "I am the Messengers of your Lord. I have come to give you a purified son".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He said, “I am indeed one sent by your Lord; so that I may give you a chaste son.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: (The angel) said: "I am only a messenger from your Lord, (to announce) to you the gift of a righteous son."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He said: I am only a messenger of your Lord: That I will give you a pure boy.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: If thou fearest God... He said, 'I am but a messenger come from thy Lord, to give thee a boy most pure.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He said: I am only a messenger of thy Lord, that I may bestow on thee a faultless son.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: I am only the messenger of your Lord," he replied. "I shall bestow upon you the gift of a son endowed with purity."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He said: I am but a meenger from thy Lord that I may bestow on thee a boy pure.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He said, ‘I am only a messenger of your Lord that I may give you a pure son.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: He said: "Nay, I am only a messenger from thy Lord, (to announce) to thee the gift of a holy son.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: (The angel) said: "I am only a Messenger from your Lord, (to announce) to you the gift of a righteous son."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: I am the Messenger of your Lord' he replied, 'and have come to give you a pure boy'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “I am only the messenger of your Lord, to give you the gift of a pure son.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: He said, "I am only the messenger of your Lord to give you [news of] a pure boy."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [19:19]   He said, ‘I am only a messenger of your Lord, that I may give you a boy [who shall be] pure’, in [his] prophethood.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He said) Gabriel said to her: (I am only a messenger of thy Lord, that I may bestow on thee) that Allah may bestow on you (a faultless son) a righteous son.
